proposal: Understanding the essence of VATRA INU as Türkiye's first community token, with 88% of the total supply directly in the hands of the community from day one, showcases a true commitment to decentralization and community empowerment. Congrats on reaching 60 holders on the ETH network! If you're looking to further engage and grow your community, our suite of B2B tools, including DEX creation and a blockchain-based lottery, could align perfectly with your vision. Let's empower your community to not just participate, but also to deploy and benefit.
